titles.title: Producing Real Opportunities for Technology and Entrepreneurs Investing in Nutrition Act
Producing Real Opportunities for Technology and Entrepreneurs Investing in Nutrition Act

To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish research centers of excellence for alternative protein innovation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
